entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.3°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 7 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
